newsitem.title: PAKISTAN: Pakistani stocks seen opening mixed, closing up.
newsitem.headline: Pakistani stocks seen opening mixed, closing up.

text.p: Pakistani stocks are likely to open mixed on Monday on short-covering in speculative scrips ahead of Tuesday's settlement day, dealers said.

Speculators sold across the board in a falling market in the last session and would now cover their positions, dealer Azhar Batla of Taurus Securities said. Prices were likely to rise on fresh buying before the close.
On Friday, the Karachi Stock Exchange 100-share index closed 3.81 points, or 0.25 percent, lower at 1,543.46 amid 147 losers and 81 gainers in a turnover of 49 million shares.
